resources.string: Add custom headers to all requests for services like Cloudflare Access etc
Manage custom headers. Each of the headers you add will be added to every API request
Require biometric authentication to connect or edit server settings
Use basic authentication if PiFire is behind a reverse proxy

This app does not enforce a secure connection to PiFire and will send your credentials and/or headers regardless of the protocol being used (http or https). It is your responsibility to setup a secure connection (https) for all requests if you are using any type of authentication, otherwise your credentials and/or headers are being sent in an unsecure manner
